column2: I am aware of the expiry dates of the food I have in my kitchen.
column3: I am likely to throw food away if it has reached the expiry date.
column4: I know where I can donate leftover food in my local area.
column5: I know how to make good use of all the food I have in my kitchen.
column6: I feel confident in planning meals to minimize food waste.
column7: I can distinguish which foods are still safe to eat after the printed expiry date, and which are not.
column8: I often forget about items in my kitchen until they go bad.
